cards.flavor_text: [i]Their essence lingers on the bloom.[/i]
[i]The angels carved it from their own ribs and painted it with blood from their veins, hoping it might confess the pain they could not.[/i]
[i]It smiles, and so they believe. It weeps, and so they mourn. Truth, meanwhile, sleeps beneath the wax.[/i]
[i]Etched into charred steel, the last thoughts of ten thousand failed spells pulse like a heartbeat.[/i]
[i]A symbol of every gnawed scrap of flesh eaten to appease to the gods of the gut.[/i]
[i]A reminder that to drink ancestral blood is to taste the pulse of the world, once vibrant, now bleeding into memory.[/i]
